name: 马克·丹尼尔
introduction: Marc recently played a principal role in the NBC/CTV medical drama 'Transplant'. Originally from Montreal, Marc attended Ryerson Theatre School in Toronto and then pursued his acting career in Toronto and Los Angeles. He also wrote and directed the award-winning short film 'Sky', and in the last few years he worked on feature and television projects as a video playback engineer, including the final three seasons of HBO's 'Veep'. In 2019 Marc returned to Montreal to focus on his full-time acting career.
